channel.title: Space Medicine 101 on Dominic Tanzillo
channel.description: Recent content in Space Medicine 101 on Dominic Tanzillo

item.title: Navigating TRISH
item.description:
To view the lectures please create an account on TRISH Orbit. Please follow this page for instructions to do so.

Create an Account for TRISH Orbit

Go to the following link: https://trish.force.com/ and create an account. When you first register you will receive an email that contains information to “Reset Your Password.” This is not a mistake, click the link to set your password.

After you’ve reset the password you will be prompted for your name and interest in space health. Feel free to give yourself any title you want.

Go to Space Health 101

Once inside the TRISH Orbit platform, there will be an series of squares. Scroll down until you see the title Space Health 101.

Alternatively click on this link once you’ve made an account: Space Health 101.

Sign Up For Email Updates

On the right hand side of the page there is an option to follow for email updates. Signup and update your email preferences to receive news whenever a page is published.

The website is still under construction but sign up for the email list to be notified whenever a lecture is published!

item.title: Space Medicine Lecturers
item.description:
Helping this course is a series of lecturers from all over the world contributing their expertese in the field of space medicine. We will be featuring these guests and publishing their lectures online.

The List is Under Contruction
